name: CSV Site
label: Site Related Columns
description: Site-level columns that appear once per site in the CSV export

name: CSV Depth
label: Depth Related Columns
description: Depth interval columns that repeat for each soil pit depth measurement

name: Site
description: Core site information including location, metadata, soil data, notes, and soil ID matches

name: Project
description: Project that contains the site

name: Soil Settings
description: Project-level soil collection settings

name: Project Depths
description: Custom depths defined by the project

name: Soil Observations
description: Site-level soil observations and configuration

name: Soil Pit Depths
description: User observations and metadata for a single depth

name: Note
description: Site observation note with author information

name: Author
description: User who authored a note

name: Soil Matches
description: Soil identification matches

name: Soil Match
description: Individual soil match with scoring

name: Match Score
description: Match scoring information (combinedMatch, dataMatch, locationMatch)

name: Soil Info
description: Detailed information about a matched soil

name: Soil Series
description: Soil series identification and description

name: Ecological Site
description: Ecological site classification

name: Land Capability Class
description: USDA land capability classification

name: Match Soil Data
description: Reference soil data from the database for a match

name: Match Depth Data
description: Reference depth-dependent data for a soil match

name: Match Depth Interval
description: Depth interval boundaries for a soil match
